original: rgyu de nyid kyis ji skad smos pa bzhin du 'byung @258b zhes bya ba ni bud shing la sogs pa'i rgyus me la sogs pa 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rgyu de nyid kyis ji skad smos pa bzhin du 'byung @258b zhes bya ba ni bud shing la sogs pa'i rgyus me la sogs pa 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The example is this: “In the same way, it is not that the light of the sun and moon fills the world first,

original: don de nyid gsal bar mdzad pa na zhes bya ba ni rgyu'i don yin no //
analyzed: don de nyid gsal bar mdzad pa na zhes bya ba ni rgyu'i don yin no //
translated: The phrase “in order to clarify that meaning” indicates the meaning of cause.

original: 'dir mig dang gzugs la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa skye'o zhes bya ba'i sbyor ba 'di ni ci nas kyang rgyu'i don kho na nyid yin par shes par bya ba'i dus snga ma shos kyis bya ba'i don du ni shes par mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir mig dang gzugs la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa skye'o zhes bya ba'i sbyor ba 'di ni ci nas kyang rgyu'i don kho na nyid yin par shes par bya ba'i dus snga ma shos kyis bya ba'i don du ni shes par mi bya'o //
translated: Here, the expression “eye consciousness arises in dependence on the eye and form” is used in order to understand that the meaning of cause is the primary meaning of the term “arising,” not the meaning of action.

original: 'byung ba ni skyes pa yin gyi yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'on te /
analyzed: 'byung ba ni skyes pa yin gyi yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'on te /
translated: The phrase “that which has arisen is an existent” indicates the following:

original: 'byung ba 'das pa gang yin pa de skyes pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'byung ba 'das pa gang yin pa de skyes pa yin gyi /
translated: You assert that that which has arisen in the past is an existent.

original: yod pa ste da ltar byung ba gang yin pa ni ma yin par 'dod cing /
analyzed: yod pa ste da ltar byung ba gang yin pa ni ma yin par 'dod cing /
translated: You also assert that that which is present is an existent.

original: khyod kyis kyang gal te yod na de'i tshe de skyes pa nyid yin pas zhes dus 'gal bar smras pa yin no snyam du de ltar sems na rtog pa de la yang gang gi tshe de zhig pa de'i tshe skyes pa yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: khyod kyis kyang gal te yod na de'i tshe de skyes pa nyid yin pas zhes dus 'gal bar smras pa yin no snyam du de ltar sems na rtog pa de la yang gang gi tshe de zhig pa de'i tshe skyes pa yin par 'gyur te /
translated: If you think that the expression “if it exists, then it has arisen” indicates that you and we have a contradiction in our views of time, then we respond as follows: In your view, when something has disintegrated, it has arisen.

original: zhig pa yin par 'gyur ba'i skyon 'dir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhig pa yin par 'gyur ba'i skyon 'dir 'gyur ro //
translated: This is the error that would ensue.

original: gzhan yang nges pa'i tshig las kyang zhes bya ba rgya cher smos pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang nges pa'i tshig las kyang zhes bya ba rgya cher smos pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, from the etymological explanation, it is said in detail.

original: gzhan yang gal te yod la ma skyes pa zhig yin na /
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te yod la ma skyes pa zhig yin na /
translated: Moreover, if it exists but is not produced,

original: skye ba'i snga rol de yod pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skye ba'i snga rol de yod pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: it would be called “existent prior to production.”

original: de'i phyir brten nas zhes bya ba yang grub po //
analyzed: de'i phyir brten nas zhes bya ba yang grub po //
translated: Therefore, “in dependence” is also established.

original: rgyu des na skye ba'i snga rol na rnam par shes pa de yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu des na skye ba'i snga rol na rnam par shes pa de yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: By that cause, consciousness would exist prior to production.

original: de'i phyir mig dang gzugs la brten nas shes par yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir mig dang gzugs la brten nas shes par yang 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, consciousness would also be dependent on the eye and form.

original: grub pa yin pas de la rnam par shes pa ni gang zhig gis brten nas phyis skye bar 'gyur ba'i snga rol na yang med cing zhes gang smras pa de mi rung ngo //
analyzed: grub pa yin pas de la rnam par shes pa ni gang zhig gis brten nas phyis skye bar 'gyur ba'i snga rol na yang med cing zhes gang smras pa de mi rung ngo //
translated: Since that is established, it is not correct to say, “Since consciousness does not exist prior to the eye and form, it is said that consciousness is dependent on the eye and form.”

original: yod pa ma skyes pa yin zhes zer na /
analyzed: yod pa ma skyes pa yin zhes zer na /
translated: If you say that it exists but is not produced,

original: yang na skye ba'i tshe yang ma skyes pa yin zhes bya ba'i skyon gzhan 'di yang yod de /
analyzed: yang na skye ba'i tshe yang ma skyes pa yin zhes bya ba'i skyon gzhan 'di yang yod de /
translated: then this other error would also exist: that which is produced is not produced.

original: skye ba'i tshe zhes bya ba ni da ltar byung ba yin la /
analyzed: skye ba'i tshe zhes bya ba ni da ltar byung ba yin la /
translated: When it arises means when it is present.

original: skyes ba zhes bya ba ni mthar thug pa'i dus yin no //
analyzed: skyes ba zhes bya ba ni mthar thug pa'i dus yin no //
translated: When it has arisen means when it has reached its end.

original: de ltar byas na skye ba'i tshe yang ma skyes pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar byas na skye ba'i tshe yang ma skyes pa yin no //
translated: Thus, when it arises, it is not yet arisen.

original: skye ba'i 'og tu rnam par shes pa de skyes pa yin pas skye ba'i 'og de'i tshe zhig pa kho na yin pas gang gi tshe zhig pa de'i tshe skyes pa yin par 'gyur bas de yang 'dod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: skye ba'i 'og tu rnam par shes pa de skyes pa yin pas skye ba'i 'og de'i tshe zhig pa kho na yin pas gang gi tshe zhig pa de'i tshe skyes pa yin par 'gyur bas de yang 'dod pa ma yin no //
translated: Since the consciousness that has arisen is subsequent to its arising, it is only when it has ceased that it has arisen. But that is unacceptable.

original: de ltar na re zhig gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa skye ba na /
analyzed: de ltar na re zhig gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa skye ba na /
translated: Thus, when consciousness arises,

original: gal te de yod na de'i phyir skyon de dag yod do //
analyzed: gal te de yod na de'i phyir skyon de dag yod do //
translated: If it exists, then these errors would exist.

original: 'on te med pa zhig yin na zhes bya ba rgya cher smos pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on te med pa zhig yin na zhes bya ba rgya cher smos pa yin no //
translated: But if it does not exist, then it is as extensively explained.

original: yang na yod pa dang med pa zhes bya ba thal ches pa'i tshig mang po bor te zhes bya ba thal ches pa'i tshig @259a * //
analyzed: yang na yod pa dang med pa zhes bya ba thal ches pa'i tshig mang po bor te zhes bya ba thal ches pa'i tshig @259a * //
translated: Or else, the many words of the reductio are omitted, such as “exists” and “does not exist.”

original: rnam pa mang po de yang ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa mang po de yang ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What are the many forms of that?

original: gal te yod na de'i tshe skye ba kho na yin no zhes rnam par rtog pa de la de'i tshig de thal ches par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te yod na de'i tshe skye ba kho na yin no zhes rnam par rtog pa de la de'i tshig de thal ches par 'gyur te /
translated: If it does exist, then at that time it is only arising.🔽The statement “It exists” is excessive,

original: yod pa ni zhes bya ba rgyas par smos pa'i yod pa na da ltar byung ba'i dus yin la /
analyzed: yod pa ni zhes bya ba rgyas par smos pa'i yod pa na da ltar byung ba'i dus yin la /
translated: because existence is the present time,

original: skyes pa zhes bya ba ni mthar thug pa yin no//
analyzed: skyes pa zhes bya ba ni mthar thug pa yin no//
translated: and arising is the final stage.

original: zhes bya ba dang / gal te de lta yin na 'byung ba ni skyes ba yin gyi yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang / gal te de lta yin na 'byung ba ni skyes ba yin gyi yod pa ma yin no //
translated: If that is so, then that which is arising is arising, not that which exists.🔽When it has disintegrated, then it would be arising.

original: gang gi tshe de zhig pa de'i tshe skyes pa yin par 'gyur ba zhig na zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa thal ches pa'i tshig mang po bor te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe de zhig pa de'i tshe skyes pa yin par 'gyur ba zhig na zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa thal ches pa'i tshig mang po bor te /
translated: Thus, many statements of excessive consequence are to be rejected.

original: gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa skye ba ni ci de'i tshe rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid kyis bdag tu bcas pa yin nam /
analyzed: gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa skye ba ni ci de'i tshe rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid kyis bdag tu bcas pa yin nam /
translated: When consciousness arises, is it at that time appropriated by consciousness in the nature of consciousness?

original: bdag med pa yin zhes dpyad par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag med pa yin zhes dpyad par bya'o //
translated: Or is it not appropriated?

original: gal te rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid kyis bdag tu bcas pa yin na de'i tshe de skye ba nyid yin pas yang skye bas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: gal te rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid kyis bdag tu bcas pa yin na de'i tshe de skye ba nyid yin pas yang skye bas ci zhig bya /
translated: If it is the self that is appropriated by the nature of consciousness, then since it is already arisen, what need is there for it to arise again?

original: 'on te zhes 'on te rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid kyis bdag med pa yin na ji ltar de bdag med par bya ba skye ba dag la skye ba'i byed pa po yin pa de bzhin du brten nas zhes bya ba yang grub pa yin te /
analyzed: 'on te zhes 'on te rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid kyis bdag med pa yin na ji ltar de bdag med par bya ba skye ba dag la skye ba'i byed pa po yin pa de bzhin du brten nas zhes bya ba yang grub pa yin te /
translated: But if it is the self that is not the nature of consciousness, then just as it is the agent of the arising of that which is to be arisen, that which is without self, in the same way, it is also established that it is dependent.

original: rnam pa de nyid kyis brten nas zhes bya ba brten pa'i byed pa po nyid du grub pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa de nyid kyis brten nas zhes bya ba brten pa'i byed pa po nyid du grub pa yin no //
translated: In that very way, it is established that it is the agent of dependence.

original: yang na don gang gis na de byed ces bya ba /
analyzed: yang na don gang gis na de byed ces bya ba /
translated: Or, by what meaning is it the agent?

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: byed pa la rang gi thun mong ma yin pa'i don ni 'ga' yang med de /
analyzed: byed pa la rang gi thun mong ma yin pa'i don ni 'ga' yang med de /
translated: Because there is no meaning that is not shared by the agent.

original: 'di ltar bde ba byed ces bya ba rgyas par smos pa la /
analyzed: 'di ltar bde ba byed ces bya ba rgyas par smos pa la /
translated: Thus, it is said, “It is the agent of pleasure,” and so on.

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Thus means for what reason.

original: de lta bas na skye ba'i byed pa po'i byed ces bya ba'i don brjod par bya dgos so zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir byed ces bya ba'i don mang du snyegs pa de'i phyir skye ba'i byed pa po'i byed ces bya ba'i don brjod par bya dgos
analyzed: de lta bas na skye ba'i byed pa po'i byed ces bya ba'i don brjod par bya dgos so zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir byed ces bya ba'i don mang du snyegs pa de'i phyir skye ba'i byed pa po'i byed ces bya ba'i don brjod par bya dgos
translated: Therefore, you must state the meaning of the phrase “the agent of the arising of arising,” because the term “agent” is applied to many things.

original: so // yang na de la skye ba'i rag lus pa ci zhig yod na gang gi phyir skye bar byed ces bya /
analyzed: so // yang na de la skye ba'i rag lus pa ci zhig yod na gang gi phyir skye bar byed ces bya /
translated: Or else, what is the dependence of arising on arising such that it is said, “because it causes the arising of arising”?

original: gal te 'byung bar byed do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'byung bar byed do zhe na /
translated: If you say, “it causes the arising of arising,”

original: de nyid thug pa med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nyid thug pa med par 'gyur te /
translated: then that would be an infinite regress.

original: skye ba de 'byung ba la ni 'byung ba med pas de ni gyi na'o //
analyzed: skye ba de 'byung ba la ni 'byung ba med pas de ni gyi na'o //
translated: Since the arising of arising does not cause the arising of arising, that is impossible.

original: rkyen rnyed pa tsam la brten nas zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa'i rkyen rnams rnyed pa tsam la brten nas zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rkyen rnyed pa tsam la brten nas zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa'i rkyen rnams rnyed pa tsam la brten nas zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: “Based on the mere acquisition of conditions” means “based on the mere acquisition of conditions such as the eyes.”

original: de la bya ba 'ga' yang med la zhes bya ba rgyas par smos pa yin no //
analyzed: de la bya ba 'ga' yang med la zhes bya ba rgyas par smos pa yin no //
translated: “There is no activity whatsoever” is an elaboration.

original: 'di ltar gzugs de la gang ci yang rung ba zhes bshad pa ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzugs de la gang ci yang rung ba zhes bshad pa ni /
translated: Thus, “any” form is explained

original: gzugs kyi don du mar @259b rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gzugs kyi don du mar @259b rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la /
translated: because form is taught as having many meanings.

original: gzugs zhes bya ba nyid don yin pas gzugs kyi don to //
analyzed: gzugs zhes bya ba nyid don yin pas gzugs kyi don to //
translated: The meaning of form is the meaning of form.

original: gzugs kyi don du ma de rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs kyi don du ma de rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because form is taught as having many meanings.

original: tshor ba la ni tshor ba'i don du ma nyid med de /
analyzed: tshor ba la ni tshor ba'i don du ma nyid med de /
translated: But feeling does not have many meanings as the meaning of feeling.

original: 'di ltar tshor ba thams cad ni myong ba'i mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar tshor ba thams cad ni myong ba'i mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: Thus, all feeling has the characteristic of experience.

original: de'i phyir de la tshor ba gang ci yang rung ba zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir de la tshor ba gang ci yang rung ba zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, “any” feeling is stated.

original: yul brtag tu rung ba'i don zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: yul brtag tu rung ba'i don zhes bya ba la /
translated: The meaning of the object that can be investigated.

original: yul brtag tu rung ba zhes bya ba ni bstan du rung ba zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: yul brtag tu rung ba zhes bya ba ni bstan du rung ba zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The object that can be investigated is the object that can be indicated.

original: yul brtag tu rung ba nyid kyi don yin pas yul brtag tu rung ba'i don yin no //
analyzed: yul brtag tu rung ba nyid kyi don yin pas yul brtag tu rung ba'i don yin no //
translated: The meaning of the object that can be investigated is the meaning of the object that can be investigated.

original: lag pa la sogs pa'i 'dus te reg pa dag gis 'gyur ba bskyed pa gzugs su rung ba'i don zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: lag pa la sogs pa'i 'dus te reg pa dag gis 'gyur ba bskyed pa gzugs su rung ba'i don zhes bya ba la /
translated: The meaning of “suitable as form” is the production of change by contact, such as contact with the hand, etc.

original: 'gyur ba bskyed pa nyid gzugs su rung ba yin la /
analyzed: 'gyur ba bskyed pa nyid gzugs su rung ba yin la /
translated: Production of change is itself suitable as form.

original: rnam par gzhag pa ni 'gyur ba skyed pa gzugs su rung ba yin no //
analyzed: rnam par gzhag pa ni 'gyur ba skyed pa gzugs su rung ba yin no //
translated: The definition is that production of change is suitable as form.

original: lag pa la sogs pa'i 'dus te reg pa dag gis 'gyur ba bskyed pa gzugs su rung ba nyid ni lag pa la sogs pa'i 'dus te reg pa dag gis 'gyur ba bskyed pa gdags su rung ba'i don yin no //
analyzed: lag pa la sogs pa'i 'dus te reg pa dag gis 'gyur ba bskyed pa gzugs su rung ba nyid ni lag pa la sogs pa'i 'dus te reg pa dag gis 'gyur ba bskyed pa gdags su rung ba'i don yin no //
translated: The meaning of “suitable as form” is the production of change by contact, such as contact with the hand, etc.

original: gzugs kyis de gdags pas gzugs su rung ba'i don zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gzugs kyis de gdags pas gzugs su rung ba'i don zhes bya ba la /
translated: The meaning of “suitable as form” is that form is suitable to be designated as that.

original: gzugs zhes bya ba lus dang ngag gi gzugs kyis so //🔽gdags pa nyid gzugs su rung ba ste /
analyzed: gzugs zhes bya ba lus dang ngag gi gzugs kyis so // gdags pa nyid gzugs su rung ba ste /
translated: “Form” means the form of body and speech.🔽Designation itself is suitable as form.

original: rnam par bzhag tu rung ba yin pas gdags pa gzugs su rung ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par bzhag tu rung ba yin pas gdags pa gzugs su rung ba'o //
translated: Suitable to be defined is suitable as designation.

original: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs der gdags pa gzugs su rung ba nyid don yin pas de gdags pa gzugs su rung ba'i don yin te /
analyzed: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs der gdags pa gzugs su rung ba nyid don yin pas de gdags pa gzugs su rung ba'i don yin te /
translated: The meaning of the term “form” is the suitability of form, which is the designation of that nonindicative form.

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba rgyas par smos pas ni gzugs kyi don rnam pa gsum char yang rgya cher rnam par ma phye bas rnam par 'byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba rgyas par smos pas ni gzugs kyi don rnam pa gsum char yang rgya cher rnam par ma phye bas rnam par 'byed pa yin no //
translated: The term “in this way” indicates that the meaning of form is not extensively differentiated, but is differentiated in three ways.

original: bstan du yod pa'i gzugs ni mig gi rnam par shes pas rnam par shes par bya ba sngon po dang / ser po la sogs pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: bstan du yod pa'i gzugs ni mig gi rnam par shes pas rnam par shes par bya ba sngon po dang / ser po la sogs pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: The form that is demonstrable is that which is cognized by the eye consciousness, such as blue, yellow, and so on.

original: 'di ni bstan du yod cing thogs pa dang bcas pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bstan du yod cing thogs pa dang bcas pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called “demonstrable and impeded.”

original: thogs pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs ni rna ba la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pas rnam par shes par bya ba sgra dang dri la sogs pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: thogs pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs ni rna ba la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pas rnam par shes par bya ba sgra dang dri la sogs pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: The form that is impeded is that which is cognized by the ear consciousness and so on, such as sound, smell, and so on.

original: 'di ni bstan du med cing thogs pa dang bcas pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bstan du med cing thogs pa dang bcas pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called “indemonstrable and impeded.”

original: bstan du med cing thogs pa med pa'i gzugs ni lus dang ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs kyis de gdags pa'i phyir @260a * //
analyzed: bstan du med cing thogs pa med pa'i gzugs ni lus dang ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs kyis de gdags pa'i phyir @260a * //
translated: Form that is not demonstrable and is not impeded is called nonindicative form of the body and speech because it is designated by the form of indicative form of the body and speech.

original: lus dang ngag gi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa zhes bya ba yin te /
analyzed: lus dang ngag gi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa zhes bya ba yin te /
translated: It is called nonindicative form of the body and speech.

original: lus kyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa zhes bya ba dang / ngag gi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa zhes bya ba dang / ngag gi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is called nonindicative form of the body and it is called nonindicative form of speech.

original: smras pa / rnam par rig byed ma yin pa de gdags pa yin na lus dang ngag gnyis kyis khas blangs nas mi byed pa tsam la ci'i phyir gzugs zhes bya zhe na /
analyzed: smras pa / rnam par rig byed ma yin pa de gdags pa yin na lus dang ngag gnyis kyis khas blangs nas mi byed pa tsam la ci'i phyir gzugs zhes bya zhe na /
translated: If that nonindicative form is designated by the body and speech, why is it called form when it is merely not committing an action after promising with both body and speech?

original: gzugs kyis zhes bya ba rgyas par smos pa yin te /
analyzed: gzugs kyis zhes bya ba rgyas par smos pa yin te /
translated: Form is called form because it is impeded and it is called form because it is demonstrable.

original: gang gi phyir lus dang ngag gi gzugs kyi rnam par rig byed ma yin bar de gdags pa gzugs su rung ba rnam par gzhag tu rung ba lus kyi spong ba dang / ngag gi spong ba zhes bya ba yin pas de'i phyir gzugs kyis gdags pa gzugs su rung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir lus dang ngag gi gzugs kyi rnam par rig byed ma yin bar de gdags pa gzugs su rung ba rnam par gzhag tu rung ba lus kyi spong ba dang / ngag gi spong ba zhes bya ba yin pas de'i phyir gzugs kyis gdags pa gzugs su rung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin no //
translated: because the noninformative form of body and speech is posited as form that is susceptible to offering, and it is suitable to designate it as the abandonment of body and the abandonment of speech. Therefore, it is said that it is form because it is susceptible to designation as form.

original: de ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /
translated: How is that known?

original: 'di ltar rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs de ni lus dang ngag gnyis med na gdags su yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs de ni lus dang ngag gnyis med na gdags su yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Because that noninformative form is not designated in the absence of both body and speech.

original: gzugs med pa na de gdags pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs med pa na de gdags pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not designated in the formless realm because it does not exist there.

original: gzugs med pa na lus dang ngag gnyis med pas 'di ltar de gdags pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa na lus dang ngag gnyis med pas 'di ltar de gdags pa med do //
translated: Since both body and speech do not exist in the formless realm, it is not designated there.

original: gzugs can ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni ma gsungs pa yin la zhes bya ba ni de la gal te chos kyi skye mched du gtogs pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs ma gzigs na cir dgos te /
analyzed: gzugs can ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni ma gsungs pa yin la zhes bya ba ni de la gal te chos kyi skye mched du gtogs pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs ma gzigs na cir dgos te /
translated: The phrase “it is not said to be formless” means that if noninformative form belonging to the phenomena element is not seen, what need is there to say that it is not form?

original: de lta bas na rnam par rig byed ma yin pa yod do //
analyzed: de lta bas na rnam par rig byed ma yin pa yod do //
translated: Thus nonindicative form exists.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How so?🔽The Sūtra Teaching the Aggregates states:

original: chos kyi skye mched bstan nas yid dang chos la brten nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa skye ste /
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched bstan nas yid dang chos la brten nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa skye ste /
translated: “Having taught the phenomena base, mental consciousness arises in dependence on the mental faculty and phenomena.

original: de la chos gzugs can yid las byung ba gang dag yin pa 'di ni gzugs kyi phung po yin no zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de la chos gzugs can yid las byung ba gang dag yin pa 'di ni gzugs kyi phung po yin no zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The form that is a mental object is the form aggregate.”🔽The form that is past and future🔽is the phenomena base.

original: gzugs can 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa gang yin pa dang / ces bya ba rgyas par smos pa ni smras pa chos gzugs can mig la sogs pa nas reg bya la thug pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa gang yin pa de dag der chos kyi skye mched yin pa de ltar ci'i phyir mi 'dod ci'i phyir zhe na
analyzed: gzugs can 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa gang yin pa dang / ces bya ba rgyas par smos pa ni smras pa chos gzugs can mig la sogs pa nas reg bya la thug pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa gang yin pa de dag der chos kyi skye mched yin pa de ltar ci'i phyir mi 'dod ci'i phyir zhe na
translated: The Vaibhāṣikas say: Why not assert that the form that is past and future and is a mental object, such as the eyes and so on up to tactility, is the phenomena base?

original: / 'di ltar de dag ni de'i tshe skye zhing mched par mi byed kyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa ni yin pa'i phyir de dag chos kyi skye mched nyid du rig pas de la rnam par rig byed ma yin pa bor na chos kyi skye mched
analyzed: / 'di ltar de dag ni de'i tshe skye zhing mched par mi byed kyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa ni yin pa'i phyir de dag chos kyi skye mched nyid du rig pas de la rnam par rig byed ma yin pa bor na chos kyi skye mched
translated: Because they do not generate or increase at that time, they are recognized as the phenomena base since they are the focal object of mental consciousness.🔽🔽Therefore, if nonindicative form is excluded, the phenomena base is the remaining phenomena that are not included in the other twelve bases.

original: du 'gyur ba chos gzugs can gzhan gang dag yod ces smras pa gang yin pa de mi rung ngo zhe na /
analyzed: du 'gyur ba chos gzugs can gzhan gang dag yod ces smras pa gang yin pa de mi rung ngo zhe na /
translated: Because they are not born and do not increase at that time, but are the focal object of mental consciousness, they are known as the phenomena base. Therefore, it is not correct to say that apart from nonindicative form, there are other physical phenomena that are the phenomena base.🔽Here, the treatise mentions, “It contradicts the sutra on the individual bases.”

original: 'dir bshad pa skye mched so so ba'i mdo dang 'gal te zhes bya ba rgyas @260b par smos pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa skye mched so so ba'i mdo dang 'gal te zhes bya ba rgyas @260b par smos pa yin no //
translated: The sutra states:

original: 'di ltar de las ni bcun pa chos phyi'i skye mched de dag gang lags /
analyzed: 'di ltar de las ni bcun pa chos phyi'i skye mched de dag gang lags /
translated: What are the phenomena that are the external bases?

original: dge slong dag chos kyi skye mched bcu gcig bo dag gis ma bsdus pa bstan du med cing thogs pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: dge slong dag chos kyi skye mched bcu gcig bo dag gis ma bsdus pa bstan du med cing thogs pa med pa yin no //
translated: Bhikṣhus, they are the eleven phenomena bases that are not included in the other eleven bases, that are not demonstrable, and that are unimpeded.

original: bcu gcig gang dag gis ma bsdus she na /
analyzed: bcu gcig gang dag gis ma bsdus she na /
translated: What are the eleven bases that are not included?

original: mig gi skye mched la sogs pa dag gis ma bsdus pa yin no zhes gsungs pa yin na //
analyzed: mig gi skye mched la sogs pa dag gis ma bsdus pa yin no zhes gsungs pa yin na //
translated: They are not included in the sense bases of eye, etc.

original: ji ltar de dang 'gal zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar de dang 'gal zhe na /
translated: How does this contradict the sutra?🔽The sutra says:

original: mig la sogs pa 'das pa dang zhes bya ba rgya cher smos pa yin te /
analyzed: mig la sogs pa 'das pa dang zhes bya ba rgya cher smos pa yin te /
translated: “Past eye, etc., and form, etc.

original: de la mig dang rna ba la sogs ba dang / gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag las gzugs gcig pu ni bstan du yod cing thogs pa dang bcas pa yin no //
analyzed: de la mig dang rna ba la sogs ba dang / gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag las gzugs gcig pu ni bstan du yod cing thogs pa dang bcas pa yin no //
translated: Among them, past and future eye, ear, etc., and form, sound, etc., are only form that is demonstrable and impeded.

original: lhag ma rnams ni bstan du med pa thogs pa dang bcas pa yin no //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni bstan du med pa thogs pa dang bcas pa yin no //
translated: The remaining are not demonstrable but are impeded.

original: de lta na de dag ni skye mched bcu gcig gis bsdus pa'i phyir dang / ji ltar rigs bar bstan du yod cing thogs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir mdo de dang 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: de lta na de dag ni skye mched bcu gcig gis bsdus pa'i phyir dang / ji ltar rigs bar bstan du yod cing thogs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir mdo de dang 'gal ba yin no //
translated: Thus they contradict the sutra because they are included in eleven sense bases and because they are demonstrable and impeded as appropriate.

original: 'on te de dag ni de'i tshe de 'di na'o //
analyzed: 'on te de dag ni de'i tshe de 'di na'o //
translated: But if they exist at that time, they exist here.

original: pa'i na'o zhes bshad du med pa thob par byar yang med pas de'i phyir bstan du med cing thogs pa dang bcas pa nyid med do zhen /
analyzed: pa'i na'o zhes bshad du med pa thob par byar yang med pas de'i phyir bstan du med cing thogs pa dang bcas pa nyid med do zhen /
translated: It is not that it is not visible, nor is it that it is not tangible.

original: de'i phyir 'di skad du yang na gzugs nyid du yang 'dod par mi bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di skad du yang na gzugs nyid du yang 'dod par mi bya ste /
translated: Therefore, it is said: “It should not be asserted that it is form,

original: 'di ltar de dag ni de'i tshe gzugs su med pas so zhes bya ba smos pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar de dag ni de'i tshe gzugs su med pas so zhes bya ba smos pa yin no //
translated: because at that time it does not exist as form.”

original: gzhan yang rigs bcu po mig gi skye mched la sogs pa gzugs can dag kyang dus su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang rigs bcu po mig gi skye mched la sogs pa gzugs can dag kyang dus su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, the ten elements that have form, such as the eye element, would not be elements.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: mig la sogs pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dag ni chos kyi skye mched yin pas so //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dag ni chos kyi skye mched yin pas so //
translated: Because the past and future eye, etc., are the phenomena element.

original: gnyis gnyis 'brel bar rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni mig gi skye mched dang / gzugs kyi skye mched nas yid kyi skye mched dang / chos kyi skye mched kyi bar du gnyis gnyis 'brel par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis gnyis 'brel bar rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni mig gi skye mched dang / gzugs kyi skye mched nas yid kyi skye mched dang / chos kyi skye mched kyi bar du gnyis gnyis 'brel par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are taught as pairs. The eye element and the form element are taught as a pair, up to the mind element and the phenomena element are taught as a pair.

original: ji ltar 'brel ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar 'brel ce na /
translated: How are they related?

original: yul can dang yul nyid du ste /🔽mig gi skye mched ni yul can yin /
analyzed: yul can dang yul nyid du ste / mig gi skye mched ni yul can yin /
translated: They are related as subject and object.

original: gzugs kyi skye mched ni yul yin /
analyzed: gzugs kyi skye mched ni yul yin /
translated: The eye sense faculty is the subject, and the form sense-sphere is the object.🔽Similarly, the mental faculty is the subject, and the entity sense-sphere is the object.

original: de bzhin du yid kyi skye mched ni yul can yin /🔽chos kyi skye mched ni yul yin pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du yid kyi skye mched ni yul can yin / chos kyi skye mched ni yul yin pa'i bar du'o //
translated: The mental faculty and the entity sense-sphere are the subject and object of the mental consciousness.🔽The mental faculty and the entity sense-sphere are the subject and object of the mental consciousness.🔽The mental faculty is the subject, and the entity sense-sphere is the object.🔽The mental faculty is the subject, and the entity sense-sphere is the object.🔽The mental faculty is the subject, and the entity sense-sphere is the object.

original: yid kyi skye mched dang / chos kyi skye mched kyi phyogs zhes bya ba rgyas par smos pa ni yid kyi skye mched kyi yul yang mig gi skye mched nas /🔽chos kyi skye mched kyi bar thams cad yin la /🔽chos kyi skye mched kyi phyogs gcig ste @261a * //
analyzed: yid kyi skye mched dang / chos kyi skye mched kyi phyogs zhes bya ba rgyas par smos pa ni yid kyi skye mched kyi yul yang mig gi skye mched nas / chos kyi skye mched kyi bar thams cad yin la / chos kyi skye mched kyi phyogs gcig ste @261a * //
translated: The mental faculty is the subject, and the entity sense-sphere is the object.🔽The mental faculty is the subject, and the entity sense-sphere is the object.🔽The mental faculty is the subject, and the entity sense-sphere is the object.🔽The mental faculty is the subject, and the entity sense-sphere is the object.🔽The mental faculty is the subject, and the entity sense-sphere is the object.🔽The mental faculty is the subject, and the entity sense-sphere is the object.🔽The mental faculty is the subject, and the entity sense-sphere is the object.🔽The mental faculty is the subject, and the entity sense-sphere is the object.🔽The mental faculty is the subject, and the entity sense-sphere is the object.🔽The mental faculty is the subject, and the entity sense-sphere is the object.🔽The mental faculty is the subject, and the entity sense-sphere is the object.🔽The mental faculty is the subject, and the entity sense-sphere is the object.🔽The mental faculty is the subject, and the entity sense-sphere is the object.🔽The mental faculty is the subject, and the entity sense-sphere is the object.🔽The mental faculty is the subject, and the entity sense-sphere is the object.🔽The mental faculty is the subject, and the entity sense-sphere is the object.🔽The mental faculty is the subject, and the entity sense-sphere is the object.🔽The mental faculty is the subject, and the entity sense-sphere is the object.🔽The mental faculty is the subject, and the entity sense-sphere is the object.

original: mtshungs par ldan pa'i yul yang thams cad yin no //
analyzed: mtshungs par ldan pa'i yul yang thams cad yin no //
translated: The mental faculty is the subject, and the entity sense-sphere is the object.

original: gnyis su nges pa nyams pa ma yin nam /🔽de nyams pa'i phyir bcu gnyis kho nar rnam par gzhag pa yang med do //
analyzed: gnyis su nges pa nyams pa ma yin nam /🔽de nyams pa'i phyir bcu gnyis kho nar rnam par gzhag pa yang med do //
translated: The mental faculty is

original: de rnam par gzhag pa med na sgra la brgal bar skye mched bcu gnyis rnams las zhes bya ba rgya cher smras pa gang yin pa de nyid kyi so na 'dug pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de rnam par gzhag pa med na sgra la brgal bar skye mched bcu gnyis rnams las zhes bya ba rgya cher smras pa gang yin pa de nyid kyi so na 'dug pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is not so classified, then the statement, from among the twelve bases, sound is the sound base is still relevant.

original: gal te de la lan du mi rung na /
analyzed: gal te de la lan du mi rung na /
translated: If you reply that this is not correct,

original: 'o na de lta na ni zhes bya ba rgyas par smos te /
analyzed: 'o na de lta na ni zhes bya ba rgyas par smos te /
translated: then Nāgārjuna’s root text says:

original: 'o na de lta na ni gzugs mang po las gcig gzugs kyi skye mched du bstan pa ni 'brel par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'o na de lta na ni gzugs mang po las gcig gzugs kyi skye mched du bstan pa ni 'brel par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If that is so, then the form base is taught to be one among many forms in order to clearly indicate the relationship between the form base and the six sense faculties.

original: ji ltar byas pas 'brel par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar byas pas 'brel par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir yin zhe na /
translated: How does it clearly indicate the relationship between the form base and the six sense faculties?

original: dbang po drug gi dbang du mdzad nas te /
analyzed: dbang po drug gi dbang du mdzad nas te /
translated: It is done in terms of the six sense faculties.

original: mig la sogs pa nas yid kyi dbang po la thug pa las brtsams te /
analyzed: mig la sogs pa nas yid kyi dbang po la thug pa las brtsams te /
translated: It begins with the eye sense faculty and concludes with the mind sense faculty.

original: mig la sogs pa nas lus kyi dbang po'i bar dbang po 'di'i yul ni gzugs la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: mig la sogs pa nas lus kyi dbang po'i bar dbang po 'di'i yul ni gzugs la sogs pa nas /
translated: The object of this sense faculty, the eye sense faculty, is form and so on, up to the object of the body sense faculty is tactile objects and so on.

original: reg bya'i bar 'di kho na yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes yul can dang yul du 'brel pa nges pa 'di rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: reg bya'i bar 'di kho na yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes yul can dang yul du 'brel pa nges pa 'di rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is the only one that is the object of the tactile faculty, and no other.

original: gnyis tshan lnga dag ces bya ba ni mig dang gzugs ni gnyis tshan gcig yin pa nas lus dang reg bya zhes bya ba 'di ni gnyis tshan lnga pa yin no //
analyzed: gnyis tshan lnga dag ces bya ba ni mig dang gzugs ni gnyis tshan gcig yin pa nas lus dang reg bya zhes bya ba 'di ni gnyis tshan lnga pa yin no //
translated: The five pairs are the two, eye and form, up to the two, body and tactility, which is the fifth pair.

original: dbang po 'di kho na'i yid kyi dbang po'i'o //
analyzed: dbang po 'di kho na'i yid kyi dbang po'i'o //
translated: The mental faculty is the sixth pair.

original: yul ni 'di yin zhes bya ba ni chos te tshor ba la sogs pa bdun no //
analyzed: yul ni 'di yin zhes bya ba ni chos te tshor ba la sogs pa bdun no //
translated: The object is the seven mental factors such as feeling.

original: gzhan gyi ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa'i'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa'i'o //
translated: The other faculties are not the object of the mental faculty.

original: gnyis tshan drug pa yin no zhes bya ba ni yid dang chos so //
analyzed: gnyis tshan drug pa yin no zhes bya ba ni yid dang chos so //
translated: The six pairs are the mental faculty and mental factors.

original: dbang po lnga dag kyang zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa nas lus kyi dbang po la thug pa yin no //
analyzed: dbang po lnga dag kyang zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa nas lus kyi dbang po la thug pa yin no //
translated: The five faculties are the five beginning with the eye and ending with the body faculty.

original: dbang po drug kho na'i zhes bya ba yid kyi dbang po'i yul yin gyi gzhan gyi ni ma yin pas gnyis tshan drug par nges pa yang nyams pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: dbang po drug kho na'i zhes bya ba yid kyi dbang po'i yul yin gyi gzhan gyi ni ma yin pas gnyis tshan drug par nges pa yang nyams pa ma yin nam /
translated: But isn’t it also the case that the six sense faculties are definitely six pairs, since the object of the mental faculty is the object of the mental faculty alone and not of the others?

original: de lta bas na 'di yang mi rung ngo zhe na /
analyzed: de lta bas na 'di yang mi rung ngo zhe na /
translated: Therefore, this is also unacceptable.

original: 'o na ni dbang po gang kho na'i zhes bya ba rgya cher smos pa'i lan gzhan 'di yod do //
analyzed: 'o na ni dbang po gang kho na'i zhes bya ba rgya cher smos pa'i lan gzhan 'di yod do //
translated: But there is another answer to the question, “What is the object of the sense faculty?”

original: de ni 'di skad du yid kyi dbang po zhes bya ba dbang po gang kho na'i yul kho na gang yin pa tshor ba la sogs pa gang dag rten ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de ni 'di skad du yid kyi dbang po zhes bya ba dbang po gang kho na'i yul kho na gang yin pa tshor ba la sogs pa gang dag rten ma yin pa'o //
translated: It is this: The object of the sense faculty called the mental faculty is that which is the object of the sense faculty alone, and that which is not the basis of feelings, etc.

original: tshor ba la sogs pa mtshungs par ldan pa rnams kyi rten ni sems kho na yin te /
analyzed: tshor ba la sogs pa mtshungs par ldan pa rnams kyi rten ni sems kho na yin te /
translated: The basis of feelings, etc., which are mental factors, is the mind alone,

original: de ma thag pa'i rkyen yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ma thag pa'i rkyen yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the condition as the equivalent and immediate antecedent.

original: tshor ba la sogs pa sems las byung ba rnams ni ma yin no //
analyzed: tshor ba la sogs pa sems las byung ba rnams ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not feelings, etc., which are mental factors.

original: de lta na gnyis tshan drug pa rnam par gzhag par @261b bya'o //
analyzed: de lta na gnyis tshan drug pa rnam par gzhag par @261b bya'o //
translated: Thus, the six pairs are established.

original: 'di ltar de dag ni yid kyi yul 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi rten yang yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar de dag ni yid kyi yul 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi rten yang yin te /
translated: They are not just objects of the mental faculty, they are also its support.

original: de dag yid kyi rten yang yin par ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /
analyzed: de dag yid kyi rten yang yin par ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /
translated: How do you know that they are also the support of the mental faculty?

original: yid ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug gi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yid ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug gi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the mental faculty is characterized by the six collections of consciousness.

original: de la mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po gang dag yid kyi mtshan nyid yin pa de rnams kyi rten ni mig la sogs pa lnga po de dag yin no //
analyzed: de la mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po gang dag yid kyi mtshan nyid yin pa de rnams kyi rten ni mig la sogs pa lnga po de dag yin no //
translated: The five collections of consciousness, such as visual consciousness, which are characterized by the mental faculty, have the five sense faculties, such as the eye, as their support.🔽The verse that summarizes this meaning is:

original: bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa ni don 'di nyid kyi dbang po gang gi ni mig la sogs pa'i dbang po'i'o //
analyzed: bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa ni don 'di nyid kyi dbang po gang gi ni mig la sogs pa'i dbang po'i'o //
translated: The faculties are the eye, etc.

original: don gang nyid ni gzugs la sogs pa yul lo //
analyzed: don gang nyid ni gzugs la sogs pa yul lo //
translated: The objects are form, etc.

original: de ltar na skye mched gnyis tshan lnga dag yin no //🔽gang nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni yid kyi dbang po'i'o //
analyzed: de ltar na skye mched gnyis tshan lnga dag yin no // gang nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni yid kyi dbang po'i'o //
translated: Thus, there are five pairs of sense bases.🔽The verse that summarizes this meaning is:🔽The faculty is just the mental faculty.

original: don nyid gang zhes bya ba ni tshor ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: don nyid gang zhes bya ba ni tshor ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The object is just the object of the mental faculty, such as feeling.

original: gnyis tshan skye mched drug pa yin no //
analyzed: gnyis tshan skye mched drug pa yin no //
translated: The six bases of contact are the second pair.

original: de'i rgyun la dgongs nas gsungs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de'i rgyun la dgongs nas gsungs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la /
translated: With the stream in mind, he said that.

original: sems de'i rgyun ni rgyud yin pas de'i rgyun no //🔽de'i rgyun la dgongs nas te /
analyzed: sems de'i rgyun ni rgyud yin pas de'i rgyun no // de'i rgyun la dgongs nas te /
translated: The stream of that mind is a continuum, thus it is the stream of that.🔽With the stream in mind means with the mind intending.

original: thugs la dgongs nas gsungs pa ni de'i rgyun la dgongs nas gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: thugs la dgongs nas gsungs pa ni de'i rgyun la dgongs nas gsungs pa ste /
translated: That which is said with the mind intending is said with the stream in mind.

original: de'i phyir ro //🔽grib ma dang me 'bar zhing 'gro ba bzhin no zhes bya ba ni ji ltar grib ma 'gro'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ro // grib ma dang me 'bar zhing 'gro ba bzhin no zhes bya ba ni ji ltar grib ma 'gro'o //
translated: Because of that,🔽it is like the statement, “The shadow goes, the fire burns and goes.

original: me 'bar zhing 'gro'o zhes bya ba de'i rgyun gyis yin par bstan pa la nyes pa med par bstan pa de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: me 'bar zhing 'gro'o zhes bya ba de'i rgyun gyis yin par bstan pa la nyes pa med par bstan pa de dang 'dra'o //
translated: ” Just as the statement, “The shadow goes, the fire burns and goes” is taught to be without fault in terms of the stream of that, so it is here.

original: der yang dgongs pa tha dad pa'i phyir 'gal ba med de zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: der yang dgongs pa tha dad pa'i phyir 'gal ba med de zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: There is no contradiction because the intention is different.

original: dgongs pa tha dad pa ni dgongs pa tha dad pa ste /
analyzed: dgongs pa tha dad pa ni dgongs pa tha dad pa ste /
translated: The intention is different means the intention is different.

original: de'i phyir dgongs pa tha dad pa'i phyir 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir dgongs pa tha dad pa'i phyir 'gal ba med do //
translated: Therefore, because the intention is different, there is no contradiction.

original: ji ltar byas pas she na /
analyzed: ji ltar byas pas she na /
translated: How is that?

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i phyogs gnyis zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i phyogs gnyis zhes bya ba la /
translated: The two sides of complete afflictions and complete purification.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyogs dang / rnam par byang ba'i phyogs mdor bsdus na rgyu dang 'bras bu phyin ci ma log pa nyid yin par dgongs te /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyogs dang / rnam par byang ba'i phyogs mdor bsdus na rgyu dang 'bras bu phyin ci ma log pa nyid yin par dgongs te /
translated: In brief, the two sides of complete afflictions and complete purification are considered to be the unerring cause and effect.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyogs la sdug bsngal phyin ci ma log pa ni 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyogs la sdug bsngal phyin ci ma log pa ni 'bras bu yin no //
translated: On the side of complete afflictions, the unerring effect is suffering.

original: kun 'byung ba phyin ci ma log pa ni 'bras bu de'i rgyu min no //
analyzed: kun 'byung ba phyin ci ma log pa ni 'bras bu de'i rgyu min no //
translated: The unerring cause of that effect is the origin.

original: rnam par byang ba'i phyogs la yang 'gog pa phyin ci ma log pa ni 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: rnam par byang ba'i phyogs la yang 'gog pa phyin ci ma log pa ni 'bras bu yin no //
translated: On the side of complete purification, the unerring effect is cessation.

original: lam phyin ci ma log pa ni 'bras bu de'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: lam phyin ci ma log pa ni 'bras bu de'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The unerring cause of that effect is the path.

original: de ltar na phyin ci ma log pa nyid yin par dgongs nas bden pa bzhi dag tu gsungs pa yin no //🔽ming gi bram ze rnams zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: de ltar na phyin ci ma log pa nyid yin par dgongs nas bden pa bzhi dag tu gsungs pa yin no // ming gi bram ze rnams zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: Thus the four truths are stated with the intention of unerring cause and effect.🔽The Brahmins of name.

original: ming gi bram ze @262a * //
analyzed: ming gi bram ze @262a * //
translated: The Brahmins of name.

original: rnams ni mchod sbyin sreg la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rnams ni mchod sbyin sreg la sogs pa'o //
translated: The etc. includes the fire sacrifice and so on.

original: mngon par mtho ba'i rgyu'i skabs su zhes bya ba ni mngon par mtho ba'i rgyu'i skabs su'o //
analyzed: mngon par mtho ba'i rgyu'i skabs su zhes bya ba ni mngon par mtho ba'i rgyu'i skabs su'o //
translated: In the context of the cause of high status means in the context of the cause of high status.

original: las dang las kyi 'bras bu dang / bdag ni de'i bdag po yin pa'i dbang du byas nas zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: las dang las kyi 'bras bu dang / bdag ni de'i bdag po yin pa'i dbang du byas nas zhes bya ba la /
translated: In terms of I am the master of the action, the result, and the self,

original: las kyi dbang du byas nas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: las kyi dbang du byas nas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: in terms of action,

original: ched du byas nas dang / 'bras bu'i dbang du byas nas dang / bdag ni de'i bdag po zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: ched du byas nas dang / 'bras bu'i dbang du byas nas dang / bdag ni de'i bdag po zhes bya ba la /
translated: in terms of the result, and in terms of I am the master of that.

original: 'bras bu'i bdag po yin pa'i dbang du byas nas bram ze'i bden pa gsum dag tu rnam par 'jog par byed do //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i bdag po yin pa'i dbang du byas nas bram ze'i bden pa gsum dag tu rnam par 'jog par byed do //
translated: In terms of being the master of the result, they posit the three truths of the brahmins.

original: gsum gang dag ce na /
analyzed: gsum gang dag ce na /
translated: What are the three?

original: go rims bzhin du mchod sbyin rnams la phyugs la sogs pa sems can de dang de dag ni gsad par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba ni las kyi dbang du byas nas bram ze'i bden pa dang po rnam par 'jog par byed pa yin no /
analyzed: go rims bzhin du mchod sbyin rnams la phyugs la sogs pa sems can de dang de dag ni gsad par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba ni las kyi dbang du byas nas bram ze'i bden pa dang po rnam par 'jog par byed pa yin no /
translated: In order, they posit the first truth of the brahmins in terms of action, saying, In the sacrifices, this and that being, such as cattle, are to be killed.

original: 'jig rten rtag pa dag 'thob bo zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'i dbang du byas nas bram ze'i bden pa gnyis pa rnam par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten rtag pa dag 'thob bo zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'i dbang du byas nas bram ze'i bden pa gnyis pa rnam par byed pa yin no //
translated: The second Brahmanical truth is stated from the perspective of the result, “One obtains the eternal world.”

original: de'i 'bras bu bdag la 'byung bas bdag ni de'i 'bras bu la za ba yin no zhes bya ba ni bram ze'i bden pa gsum pa'i dbang du byas nas rnam par 'jog par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu bdag la 'byung bas bdag ni de'i 'bras bu la za ba yin no zhes bya ba ni bram ze'i bden pa gsum pa'i dbang du byas nas rnam par 'jog par byed pa yin no //
translated: The third Brahmanical truth is stated from the perspective of the result, “I am the one who enjoys the result of that, since that result occurs to me.”

original: de yang don yang dag pa'i bram ze slob pa dang mi slob ba rnams la brdzun pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang don yang dag pa'i bram ze slob pa dang mi slob ba rnams la brdzun pa yin no //
translated: That is false for the true Brahmins, the learners and the nonlearners.

original: bzlog pa ni bden pa yin pa'i phyir de la dgongs nas bram ze'i bden pa gsum dag tu gsungs so //
analyzed: bzlog pa ni bden pa yin pa'i phyir de la dgongs nas bram ze'i bden pa gsum dag tu gsungs so //
translated: The opposite is true, and the Buddha spoke of the three Brahmanical truths with that in mind.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: rgyas par gsungs nas bram ze dang / kun du rgyu dag bram ze rnams 'di skad du sems can thams cad ni gsad par bya ba ma yin no zhes zer na bden pa kho na zer ba yin te /
analyzed: rgyas par gsungs nas bram ze dang / kun du rgyu dag bram ze rnams 'di skad du sems can thams cad ni gsad par bya ba ma yin no zhes zer na bden pa kho na zer ba yin te /
translated: The Buddha spoke extensively to the Brahmins and the wandering ascetics, “Brahmins, when you say, ‘No sentient being should be killed,’ you are speaking the truth.

original: brdzun pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba rgya cher 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: brdzun pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba rgya cher 'byung ba yin no //
translated: It is not false.

original: ma nor ba ni ma 'khrul pa yin no //
analyzed: ma nor ba ni ma 'khrul pa yin no //
translated: Nonerroneous means nondeceptive.

original: dper na rkang pa gnyis kyis rgal bar byed pa'i 'bab stegs la zhes bya ba ni 'di nas rgal bar byed pas na 'bab stegs so //
analyzed: dper na rkang pa gnyis kyis rgal bar byed pa'i 'bab stegs la zhes bya ba ni 'di nas rgal bar byed pas na 'bab stegs so //
translated: For example, a ford for crossing with two legs is a place where one crosses with two legs.

original: brgal bar bya ba'i sgra mi mngon par byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brgal bar bya ba'i sgra mi mngon par byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The word “crossing” is elided.

original: de bzhin du ko grus brgal bar bya ba'i 'bab stegs la ko gru'i 'bab stegs zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du ko grus brgal bar bya ba'i 'bab stegs la ko gru'i 'bab stegs zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Similarly, a ford for crossing with a boat is called a boat ford.

original: de bzhin du kun rdzob des khong du chud par bya ba ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du kun rdzob des khong du chud par bya ba ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa ste /
translated: Similarly, the object to be understood by that conventional truth is conventional truth.

original: khong du chud par bya ba'i sgra mi mngon par byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khong du chud par bya ba'i sgra mi mngon par byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The word “to be understood” is elided.

original: ston pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni ston pa ser skya dang 'ug pa la sogs pa mu stegs can rnams kyi lugs tha dad pa ste /
analyzed: ston pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni ston pa ser skya dang 'ug pa la sogs pa mu stegs can rnams kyi lugs tha dad pa ste /
translated: The different systems of the teachers, such as Kapila and Uluka, are the different systems of the tīrthikas.

original: de'i grub pa'i @262b mtha' tha dad pa la dgongs nas zhes bya ba ni thugs la dgongs nas bden pa ni gcig kho na ste /
analyzed: de'i grub pa'i @262b mtha' tha dad pa la dgongs nas zhes bya ba ni thugs la dgongs nas bden pa ni gcig kho na ste /
translated: With the intention of their different tenets, he said, There is only one truth,

original: gnyis pa med do zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gnyis pa med do zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
translated: there is no second.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar bden pa gnyis phan tshun 'gal ba dag ni 'di kho na bden pa yin zhes bya bar mi nus pas so //
analyzed: 'di ltar bden pa gnyis phan tshun 'gal ba dag ni 'di kho na bden pa yin zhes bya bar mi nus pas so //
translated: Because two truths that are mutually contradictory cannot be said to be only this is true.

original: de la de gnyis kyi rgyu yod cing zhes bya ba ni phung po'i rgyun de la de gnyis kyi sems pa la sogs pa yod do //
analyzed: de la de gnyis kyi rgyu yod cing zhes bya ba ni phung po'i rgyun de la de gnyis kyi sems pa la sogs pa yod do //
translated: With the intention of the existence of the cause of those two in that continuum of aggregates, he said, There is the cause of those two.

original: rgyu tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rgyu byed pa po las dgongs nas byed pa po mi dmigs so zhes gsungs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rgyu byed pa po las dgongs nas byed pa po mi dmigs so zhes gsungs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: With the intention of the cause of the collection of causes, the agent of the cause, he said, the agent is not perceived.

original: 'di ltar mdo de nyid las gang zhig phung po 'di dag 'dor zhing phung po gzhan dag tu mtshams sbyor bar byed pa'i zhes bya ba de lta bu'i mtshan nyid kyi byad pa po ni mdo lta bu'i mtshan nyid kyi byed pa po ni med do zhes bya🔽ba khyad par du mdzad pa dag yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar mdo de nyid las gang zhig phung po 'di dag 'dor zhing phung po gzhan dag tu mtshams sbyor bar byed pa'i zhes bya ba de lta bu'i mtshan nyid kyi byad pa po ni mdo lta bu'i mtshan nyid kyi byed pa po ni med do zhes bya ba khyad par du mdzad pa dag yin no //
translated: “There is no agent that possesses the characteristics of a sutra, that is, that abandons these aggregates and links with other aggregates.”🔽Even though karma ceases,

original: las rnams nub kyang de'i 'bras bu //
analyzed: las rnams nub kyang de'i 'bras bu //
translated: its effect arises.

original: skye ba de yi chos nyid do //
analyzed: skye ba de yi chos nyid do //
translated: This is the nature of things.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is this so?

original: las rnams nub par gyur du zin kyang las des yongs su bsgos pa'i sems kyi khyad par las rim gyis rgyud de nyid las 'bras bu 'byung ngo //
analyzed: las rnams nub par gyur du zin kyang las des yongs su bsgos pa'i sems kyi khyad par las rim gyis rgyud de nyid las 'bras bu 'byung ngo //
translated: Even though karma has ceased, its effect arises from the mind that is imbued with that karma, and that effect arises from that very continuum.

original: de kho na bzhin du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de kho na bzhin du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is accepted that this is the way things are.

original: ji ltar na de ltar khas blangs pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na de ltar khas blangs pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is this accepted?
